label: GOES
description: Satellite system operated for geostationary meteorological observation and data relay services.

label: HF RADIO
description: High-frequency (HF) radio communication system used for long-range data transmission.

label: ARGOS
description: Satellite-based data collection and location system used for environmental monitoring platforms.

label: ORBCOMM
description: Satellite communication system providing low-data-rate messaging services via a low Earth orbit satellite constellation.

label: IRIDIUM
description: Satellite communication system providing global voice and data services via a constellation of low Earth orbit (LEO) satellites.

label: UNKNOWN
description: Unknown data telecommunication system.

label: INMARSAT
description: Satellite communication system providing global mobile voice and data services via geostationary satellites.

label: METEOSAT
description: Geostationary meteorological satellite system providing environmental observation and data relay services.

label: ARGOS3
description: Argos-3 two-way satellite communication system supporting bidirectional data transmission.

label: VHF RADIO
description: Very high-frequency (VHF) radio communication system used for short-range data transmission.

label: INSAT
description: Indian National Satellite System providing communication, meteorological, and data relay services.

label: AIS
description: Automated Identification System used for vessel identification and tracking, either directly or via satellite.

label: LRIT
description: Long-Range Identification and Tracking system used primarily for ship position reporting and maritime safety.

label: GLOBALSTAR
description: Satellite communication system providing mobile voice and data services via a low Earth orbit satellite constellation.

label: GMS
description: Geostationary Meteorological Satellite (GMS) data collection platform providing meteorological observation and data relay services.

label: VSAT
description: Very Small Aperture Terminal (VSAT) satellite communication system providing two-way data connectivity.

label: NONE
description: No data telecommunication system used (e.g. delayed mode only, manually retrieved after a cruise).

label: OTHER
description: Other data telecommunication system not listed in this vocabulary.

label: BEIDOU
description: Chinese satellite navigation and communication system providing positioning, timing, and data communication services.

label: CELLULAR
description: Communication using terrestrial cellular wireless networks (e.g. GSM, GPRS, LTE).

label: FREEWAVE
description: Radio communication system using FreeWave radio modems for long-range wireless data transmission.

label: STARLINK
description: Satellite communication system based on a constellation of low Earth orbit satellites providing broadband data connectivity.
